00028 /******************************************************************************
00029 ********************************* ISOC CONFIG *********************************
00030 *******************************************************************************/
00031 typedef struct configuration_descriptor_isoc_t
00032 {
00033     USB_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR               sConfigDesc;
00034     USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR    sInterfaceDesc0;
00035         USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR        sInterfaceDesc1;
00036     USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR             sDataInEp;
00037         USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR         sDataOutEp;
00038 
00039 }__ATTR_PACKED__ CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_ISOC;
00040 
00041 #define CONF_DESCRIPTOR_ISOC_LENGTH             sizeof(CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_ISOC)
00042 
00043 static CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_ISOC            IMG_sISOCConfigurationDescriptor_FS __USBD_ATTR__ IMG_ALIGN(4) = 
00044 {
00045         /* Configuration descriptor */
00046         {
00047                 USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,    // UCHAR   bLength;
00048                 USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,      // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00049                 USB_INI16(CONF_DESCRIPTOR_ISOC_LENGTH), // USHORT  wTotalLength;
00050                 0x01,                                   // UCHAR   bNumInterfaces;
00051                 0x01,                                   // UCHAR   bConfigurationValue;
00052                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   iConfiguration;
00053                 0xC0,                                   // UCHAR   bmAttributes D7=reserved(set to 1);D6=self powered; D5=remote wakeup; D4-0 reserved (0);
00054                 0x00                                    // UCHAR   MaxPower;
00055         },
00056         /* Interface descriptor */
00057         {
00058                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,        // UCHAR   bLength;
00059                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,          // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00060                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceNumber;
00061                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bAlternateSetting;
00062                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bNumEndpoints;
00063                 USB_CLASS_VENDOR_SPEC,                  // UCHAR   bInterfaceClass;
00064                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceSubClass;
00065                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceProtocol;
00066                 0x00                                    // UCHAR   iInterface;
00067         },
00068         /* Interface descriptor */
00069         {
00070                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,        // UCHAR   bLength;
00071                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,          // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00072                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceNumber;
00073                 0x01,                                   // UCHAR   bAlternateSetting;
00074                 0x02,                                   // UCHAR   bNumEndpoints;
00075                 USB_CLASS_VENDOR_SPEC,                  // UCHAR   bInterfaceClass;
00076                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceSubClass;
00077                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceProtocol;
00078                 0x00                                    // UCHAR   iInterface;
00079         },
00080         /* Endpoint descriptors */
00081         {
00082                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,         // UCHAR   bLength;
00083                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,           // UCHAR   ENDPOINT descriptor = 0x05
00084                 0x81,                                   // UCHAR   endpoint number (b3-b0: address, b7: direction (0=out, 1=in)
00085                 0x01,                                                                   // UCHAR   attributes: b1-b0: Tx type (00=control, 01=iso, 10=bulk, 11=IMG_INT32). for iso {b3-b2: sync type, b5-b4: usage type}
00086                 USB_INI16(0x0040),                      // USHORT  max packet size b10-b0=max packet size (56). For high speed iso: b12-b11 = number of additional transactions opportunities per microframe (0)
00087                 0x01                                                                    // UCHAR   interval
00088         },
00089         {
00090                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,         // UCHAR   bLength;
00091                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,           // UCHAR   ENDPOINT descriptor = 0x05
00092                 0x01,                                       // UCHAR   endpoint number (b3-b0: address, b7: direction (0=out, 1=in)
00093                 0x01,                                                                   // UCHAR   attributes: b1-b0: Tx type (00=control, 01=iso, 10=bulk, 11=IMG_INT32). for iso {b3-b2: sync type, b5-b4: usage type}
00094                 USB_INI16(0x0040),                      // USHORT  max packet size b10-b0=max packet size (56). For high speed iso: b12-b11 = number of additional transactions opportunities per microframe (0)
00095                 0x01                                                            // UCHAR   interval
00096         }
00097 };
00098 
00099 /* High speed */
00100 static CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_ISOC            IMG_sISOCConfigurationDescriptor_HS __USBD_ATTR__ IMG_ALIGN(4) = 
00101 {
00102         /* Configuration descriptor */
00103         {
00104                 USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,    // UCHAR   bLength;
00105                 USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,      // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00106                 USB_INI16(CONF_DESCRIPTOR_ISOC_LENGTH), // USHORT  wTotalLength;
00107                 0x01,                                   // UCHAR   bNumInterfaces;
00108                 0x01,                                   // UCHAR   bConfigurationValue;
00109                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   iConfiguration;
00110                 0xC0,                                   // UCHAR   bmAttributes D7=reserved(set to 1);D6=self powered; D5=remote wakeup; D4-0 reserved (0);
00111                 0x00                                    // UCHAR   MaxPower;
00112         },
00113         /* Interface descriptor */
00114         {
00115                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,        // UCHAR   bLength;
00116                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,          // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00117                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceNumber;
00118                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bAlternateSetting;
00119                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bNumEndpoints;
00120                 USB_CLASS_VENDOR_SPEC,                  // UCHAR   bInterfaceClass;
00121                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceSubClass;
00122                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceProtocol;
00123                 0x00                                    // UCHAR   iInterface;
00124         },
00125         /* Interface descriptor */
00126         {
00127                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,        // UCHAR   bLength;
00128                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,          // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00129                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceNumber;
00130                 0x01,                                   // UCHAR   bAlternateSetting;
00131                 0x02,                                   // UCHAR   bNumEndpoints;
00132                 USB_CLASS_VENDOR_SPEC,                  // UCHAR   bInterfaceClass;
00133                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceSubClass;
00134                 0x00,                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceProtocol;
00135                 0x00                                    // UCHAR   iInterface;
00136         },
00137         /* Endpoint descriptors */
00138         {
00139                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,         // UCHAR   bLength;
00140                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,           // UCHAR   ENDPOINT descriptor = 0x05
00141                 0x81,                                   // UCHAR   endpoint number (b3-b0: address, b7: direction (0=out, 1=in)
00142                 0x01,                                                                   // UCHAR   attributes: b1-b0: Tx type (00=control, 01=iso, 10=bulk, 11=IMG_INT32). for iso {b3-b2: sync type, b5-b4: usage type}
00143                 USB_INI16(1024),                        // USHORT  max packet size b10-b0=max packet size (56). For high speed iso: b12-b11 = number of additional transactions opportunities per microframe (0)
00144                 0x01                                                                    // UCHAR   interval
00145         },
00146         {
00147                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,         // UCHAR   bLength;
00148                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,           // UCHAR   ENDPOINT descriptor = 0x05
00149                 0x02,                                       // UCHAR   endpoint number (b3-b0: address, b7: direction (0=out, 1=in)
00150                 0x01,                                                                   // UCHAR   attributes: b1-b0: Tx type (00=control, 01=iso, 10=bulk, 11=IMG_INT32). for iso {b3-b2: sync type, b5-b4: usage type}
00151                 USB_INI16(1024),                        // USHORT  max packet size b10-b0=max packet size (56). For high speed iso: b12-b11 = number of additional transactions opportunities per microframe (0)
00152                 0x01                                                            // UCHAR   interval
00153         }
00154 };
00155 
00156 USBD_CONFIGURATION_T    IMG_sIsocConfigurations =
00157 {
00158         {
00159                 &IMG_sISOCConfigurationDescriptor_FS,
00160                 0
00161         },                                                                                      /* apsConfigsFullSpeed */
00162         {
00163                 &IMG_sISOCConfigurationDescriptor_HS,
00164                 0
00165         },                                                                                      /* apsConfigsHighSpeed */
00166         1                                                                                       /* the number of configurations available */
00167 };
